# main-with-api

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]

> A module with main and api

## Installation

Install `main-with-api` using [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/):

```bash
npm install --save main-with-api
```

## Usage

### Module usage

```javascript
const mainWithApi = require('main-with-api');

// ...
```

## API

### `mainWithApi(a, b)`

| Name | Type | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| a | `Mixed` | ... |
| b | `Mixed` | ... |

...
